website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced laser receiver from a leader in tool manufacturing.
pros: Shuts off automatically to save power
Has magnets for easy attachment to metal
cons: Beep is loud and high in pitch
Range is not as far as some other laser receivers

customer_reviews.title: not compatible with other green light lasers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Dewalt line generator. Tried to used it today with a Topcon rotary green laser for a more accurate long distance use at work...does not read the green laser light at all. Good for their product, not for anything else, but a heads up if you think you can use this with top end equipment...no go.
customer_reviews.author: Earl H Crabb

customer_reviews.title: My husband is a professional trim carpenter, and he ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a professional trim carpenter, and he loves this. It allows him to line up the laser much more quickly, and is especially helpful in bright areas where it’s harder to see the line. His foreman was very impressed with how quickly he can get things lined up using this
customer_reviews.author: lenergyrlah

customer_reviews.title: Not as sensitive as other detectors.
customer_reviews.text: This detector is not as sensitive as I would've hoped. It is not as sensitive as other brands of detectors. It works, but not a great distances.
customer_reviews.author: Intelligentsia

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Not real impressed, not sure why, brand new batteries, outside I can't get it to read more than 8' away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love green!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly need this inside, as the green laser has an awesome range. But outside it is very useful, extending my range as far as I'll ever need. Love green!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Sauve

customer_reviews.title: This green laser works awesome for me
customer_reviews.text: This green laser works awesome for me. I bought it to help me lay out racks for conduit. I use it all the time. In fact I had other contractors ask to use it, a week later 2 of those contractors had their own dewalt green lazers. The only downside fault is they don't sell a complete kit, had to order additional pieces. Yes it is a little spendy but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS SWOBODA

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good. Finishes out the Dewalt 3-360 laser level as a construction tool. Not quite sure of the advertised range. Appears to be about 2/3 of what is advertised (with my testing). That's the only reason it didn't get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TEC

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great range, even in bright sunlight with laser was not visible, the detector picked it up. Would be nice to have little more range vertically for grading. But works perfect so worth money.
customer_reviews.author: BLSBounty

customer_reviews.title: Works with the Kiaweets green 360 Laser.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to work with the Kiaweets 360 Green Laser. Works fine, just remember to turn on the pulse mode on the laser.
customer_reviews.author: Soaring

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This won’t even pick up on the laser when I can see it on the detector, let me exchange it assume it’s broken and I’ll change my review if that detector works. But right now I bought this February and it doesn’t work and I can’t exchange it as of April 7. Can literally see the laser but it won’t detect it ten feet away, let alone 30-100’ away like it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and built well but a limited 165' range.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. It has a selectable fine and course range that's actually almost too precise on the course setting if using to shoot excavation or grading. The only major drawback is the limited 165' range. Overall a great detector.
customer_reviews.author: Ohmsy

customer_reviews.title: Works really well with the DW089LG.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with the DW089LG.It does not have a back display but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: Gu4u2

customer_reviews.title: Great lil helper
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my fiancé and he said it makes his job so much easier. He has thanked me a million times for getting it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for alot better performance. More than 10 or 12 feet it gets very frustrating when it wont read the laser. Thanks for taking my money.
customer_reviews.author: F. Bair

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs UP
customer_reviews.text: Extends the range of my laser tool for larger areas - very handy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: A fast beep or slow beep depending on which side of the target line the laser is hitting.
customer_reviews.text: From 100' away I cannot see the exact location of the laser. With the slow/fast beep I can dial it in perfectly. Now I don't have to get up and walk to the end several times to adjust the laser.
customer_reviews.author: RestorationCarpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the instrument.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have already used it in my work-a great helper if you need to make a chipping of lines at a distance of 50 meters! Convenient multifunction sensor fastener allows it to be attached to vertical posts. Very pleased with the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Георгий Сухиташвили

customer_reviews.title: It works, and it works with other green lasers :)
customer_reviews.text: It works, and it also works with other green lasers that have a pulse function :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works very good with my DW0822LG laser, Could have been a little smaller like the PLS one
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great even in bright sunlight
customer_reviews.text: Figured it wouldn’t work and I was wrong. Very happy with the accuracy. Works in bright sunlight 100’ away. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not very good for outside use.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work outside very good, maybe 40' tops in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this detector it makes outdoor leveling so precise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for it
customer_reviews.text: Working out site where light not visible it helps to pick up beam
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Szymamik

customer_reviews.title: ... is no vibration in the area and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: make sure that there is no vibration in the area and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DEWALT Laser Detector, Green (DW0892G)
product_meta.description: DEWALT DW0892G Green Laser Detector is accurate to 1.5mm at 30m. It has a working range 165ft (Radius). This unit detects laser beam indoors and out. It offers both front and rear back-lit LCD displays, along with an audible signal with adjustable volume control. An automatic shutoff turns off detector if inactive for 5 minutes as a battery-saving feature. It also offers top-mounted magnets for attachment to ceiling track or steel studs, with a heavy-duty quick release clamp also included. This detector operates on a 9v battery (included).
feature_bullets: Front and rear back-lit LCD displays
Top-mounted magnets for attachment to ceiling track or steel studs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
